FinalRollup: We recommend you do a soil translocation or a noninoculated wattle.

We recommend you do a soil translocation or a noninoculated wattle to stimulate activity. The soil translocation method performed well in forested ecosystems and the noninoculated wattle performed best after that. Click "download protocol" button to download a pdf of the protocols.
We recommend that you inoculate wattles with a single strain of local phoenix oyster.
